title: Calling all Rioters!
body: Hey! The name's Deluxe and I've been playing since '09 off and on, more on these past couple seasons. I'm currently at Normals win number 999 and I was wondering if any of the Riot staff would be able to play with me for my 4 digit win in a couple hours? Thanks in advanced! Just add me or reply on here if you're able!

replies.body: Seems I'm a little late to the party! I'd still be happy to play if you're interested! :D
Hey, can you guys look at Justicar Aatrox on youtube from skinspotlights? can u see any difference? i hope u guys do.

> Hey, can you guys look at Justicar Aatrox on youtube from skinspotlights? can u see any difference? i hope u guys do.

???? O.o Wrong post, dude. I have no idea what you're talking about either.
